metadata.synopsis: Patron Bombasto, dialogue at Elfsong Tavern. Spraks about the Flaming Fists.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Click on S_Elfsong_Patron_006 at Elfsong Tavern.

0.speaker: Bombasto
0.text: Of course, if I was one of the Fists, I'd make sure things got straightened out in these streets double-quick.
0.context: InternalNodeContext: The base topic of this character. You can choose between: Murders at temple, Steel Watch, Brain-Quakes, Impending coronation of Gortash, Gang war: Guild vs. Stone Men, Approaching Army of the Absolute

1.speaker: Bombasto
1.text: I sure wouldn't want to be one of the Flaming Fists - they've got the shittiest job in town. Believe me, I know something about knocking heads together.
1.context: InternalNodeContext: The base topic of this character. You can choose between: Murders at temple, Steel Watch, Brain-Quakes, Impending coronation of Gortash, Gang war: Guild vs. Stone Men, Approaching Army of the Absolute
